title: Mrbigbag
author: Mrbigbag
content: Why is there no news on xdn ?  do you think it has a future.

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: $0.0000598 per token with 700$ market trade volumeIt hasnt had significant value since 2018... Maybe in the next bull run it moves, how much do you have?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbigbag on May 04, 2023, 04:12:02 PMWhy is there no news on xdn ?  do you think it has a future.Well their own web page has been updating news and that's pretty good for a coin from 2014 that i thought was died several years ago. I honestly don't know about the future but it will most likely pump again some day as the history of the charts show (if there's still development and community). But as i don't have a clue what could trigger that pump i don't either have a clue when that would be. Could be years from now so i won't risk a penny for it. Micro marketcap is tempting though.

comments.author: Mrbigbag
comments.body: About 7million XDN but I was contemplating if I should get more.Do you own any?

comments.author: Mrbigbag
comments.body: I Invested 10k in xdn in the last bull market and it is now £100. I don't see a lot of new news about the coin. But I have heard its a good coin and has been around for some while. I wanted to discover the pros and cons of Xdn digitalnote. I do feel like it will pump again. Still thinking bout getting more of a bag.does anyone hold xdn?

comments.author: masulum
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbigbag on May 04, 2023, 11:03:22 PMI Invested 10k in xdn in the last bull market and it is now £100. I don't see a lot of new news about the coin. But I have heard its a good coin and has been around for some while. I wanted to discover the pros and cons of Xdn digitalnote. I do feel like it will pump again. Still thinking bout getting more of a bag.does anyone hold xdn?I also have XDN which I bought in 2018 then on Bittrex and I still have it stored there because it is no longer worth I have no intention of withdrawing it. Luckily I only spent $50 at that time, the current price is far from what I bought it for. The Twitter activity of XDN does not provide any important information, only a shill to buy XDN. From this we will see that XDN is nearing its end, volume that just leaves below USD 1000 indicates no interest anymore. The XDN thread on this forum doesn't have any updates, so maybe we should forget about it.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Unfortunately, I do not see any future for the currency, I do not want to cause you frustration, but this currency is already dying, look at the chart today, it continues to fall more and more.However, if you have large quantities, it is better to leave it and forget it, maybe the price will go up in the future, no one knows.

comments.author: Mrbigbag
comments.body: I was thinking because it a small cap it is highly volatile when it moves it moves big down or up.The big problem for me is that i see lack of development on the project and the marketing is very poor.what i am hoping for is it has one more bull run before it dies.

comments.author: dtc2017
